name: Marble Ball Racing 2022
description: Marble ball racing 2022 is a racing game. Player will control marble ball to race with other 30 AI marble ball in 57unique track. You can control ball with left and right arrow key or A and D key. Player can select game level in option menu. Game level have 3 level (normal ,Hard , Expert) . In  normal level, player will pass to next stage if place 15th or better. In hard level, player will pass to next stage if place 10th or better. In expert level, player will pass to next stage if place 5th or better.
